string-array.name: help_strings
string-array.item: When you push the bomb you will spend a spark. If no sparks are available then game is over.
If the bomb acquires a red color then next push will cause explosion. You can\'t push the bomb until reaction doesn\'t stop
You get one spark after every fifth bomb explosion and at the end of level
The main goal is to explode as many bombs as possible using the least amount of sparks
At at game start you have three shakes. Shake the phone and all red bombs will explode.
